group_1.textRight: I won't hang out with you.

group_1.textLeft: Haha! I'm not here for that.

group_1.textRight: What...!
Then...what are you here for?

group_1.textLeft: Well...
Uhh, what do I say... [chara:305801:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:305801:eyeClose_1][chara:305801:lipSynch_1]ahem...
I'm gonna kick your ass!
Therefore, let's go to a riverbed where no one@will see us.

group_1.textRight: (What the heck... I can't decipher this at all...)
(But... maybe that's fine.)
(If this is going to happen someday anyway...@better now, while it’s not too late...)
Fine.
...[wait:1.0][chara:302100:lipSynch_1]so, what do you want?

group_1.textLeft: "It’s not too late yet"... you came with me 'cause@that's what you were thinking, yeah?
How do I say it...
Your shoes...
...were in the shoe cupboard.
Your shoe cupboard.

group_1.textRight: [chara:302100:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]―?!
You found them...

group_1.textLeft: Also, your class has a group chat, doesn't it?
There's a lotta malicious gossip about you going@on in there.
But most of it was just someone starting the gossip,@and everyone else chiming in.
Just the same old flow of events, over and over.
But those who chimed in were mostly just@responding...
The only one who’d write anything specific was@the first guy.
I can only guess... but that "first guy"...
...is you, right?
In short, you’re the one who spread malicious@gossip about yourself...
And you're the one who hid your own shoes...

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:1.0][chara:302100:motion_200][chara:302100:cheek_0][chara:302100:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:302100:lipSynch_1]huh?
Do you even believe what’s coming out of your@own mouth?
What on earth would I gain by doing such things@to myself?

group_1.textLeft: ...a long time ago, there was a bullying incident@in my class.
Well, the problem was solved when I beat the@shit out of that bully.
But that’s beside the point...
There were plenty of students who noticed the@bullying before I did.
So, what did those who noticed it first do...?
Believe it or not... they all tried to stay the hell@out of it.
What, was it because they didn't like the kid who@was being bullied?
That’s not it at all.
In fact, they were all rather sympathetic, hoping@someone would go to help.
But they were too scared to get involved@themselves.
"Guess that sorta stuff happens too", was what@I thought.
Though it actually seems like a pretty common@phenomenon.

group_1.textRight: So what? That has nothing to do with this.

group_1.textLeft: No, I mean, let’s say someone has a special@situation where they’re not allowed to stand out...
But they didn’t want to make any friends, either...
Suppose that there is such a student...
I figured mayyybe they would take advantage of@this phenomenon.
Well, I'm talking about you, buddy.
In other words, you’re the one who did all that...

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:1.0][chara:302100:lipSynch_1]Yeah, I am.
I wanted to be isolated.
I’ve been saying so from the beginning, y’know?@I had no choice but to isolate myself.
Which is why I pretended to be an outcast.
For man, the surest path to isolation is to play as@an isolated character.
Just like what you said, yeah?
